data.title: Google's G Suite bundle exceeds 6M customers
data.text: CNBC's Deirdre Bosa reports that Google's G suite bundle has now exceeded 6 million customers.

data.title: Google's G Suite now has 6 million paying businesses, up from 5 million in Feb. 2019
data.text: "The business of G Suite is growing at an incredibly healthy and, frankly for me, surprising rate," Javier Soltero, vice president and general manager of G Suite at Google, told CNBC in an interview on Tuesday.

data.title: 9 AI Stocks We’re Leaning on More and More
data.text: With coronavirus news dominating headlines 24/7, it’s difficult to think positively. However, when the carnage is finally over, these nine AI stocks have a great shot at moving higher.

data.title: Google's UK staff earned average of £234,000 in 2019
